attributes.action: Stop the wind turbine being built in King's Lynn
attributes.additional_details: They are building a new wind turbine near north Lynn which will stand 200ft tall. You can see it being built right now. This needs to be taken down straight away. whether your anti wind or you just generally care about the landscape this so called landmark needs to be stop. I do not need to describe why wind power is bad they is plenty information out there. But i thought we at least deserve a say on whether it should be built. if we live in a democracy we should be allowed to choose our energy sources and where they go.
